titleStmt.title: The Copie of a letter sent from divers knights and gentlemen of Nottinghamshire to the knights serving for that county in Parliament

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ..., and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Digby [and 80 others].
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
